action.content: DESCRIPTION: The TARGET ROOM is a well-organized walk-in closet with wooden shelving and drawers. On the left side, there are hanging clothes including shirts and pants. The central section has multiple shelves filled with folded clothes, boxes, and shoes, along with several drawers below. On the right side, there are more hanging clothes, mostly dresses, next to a large arched window that lets in natural light. Below the window is a cushioned wooden bench. The room has a clean and tidy appearance
